languages.text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость, но..." {n}Церемониймейстер переходит на заговорщицкий шепот.{/n} "Перед тем, как вы покинете гостей, вам стоит поприветствовать Вольных Торговцев Чорда и Винтерскейл. Их визит — знак уважения к вашим правам, и было бы крайне прискорбно, если бы они оскорбились вашим невниманием".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, Ваша милость, но..." {n}Церемониймейстер переходит на заговорщицкий шепот.{/n} "Перед тем, как вы покинете гостей, вам стоит поприветствовать Вольных Торговцев Чорда и Винтерскейл. Их визит — знак уважения к вашим правам, и было бы крайне прискорбно, если бы они оскорбились вашим невниманием".

languages.text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but..." {n}The master of ceremonies lowers his voice to a conspiratorial whisper.{/n} "Before you leave your guests, you may wish to greet Rogue Traders Chorda and Winterscale. Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость, но..." {n}Церемониймейстер переходит на заговорщицкий шепот.{/n} "Перед тем, как вы покинете гостей, вам стоит поприветствовать Вольных Торговцев Чорда и Винтерскейл. Их визит — знак уважения к вашим правам, и было бы крайне прискорбно, если бы они оскорбились вашим невниманием".

Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

"Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but..." {n}The master of ceremonies lowers his voice to a conspiratorial whisper.{/n} "Before you leave your guests, you may wish to greet Rogue Traders Chorda and Winterscale. Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

languages.text: 「左様ですか、陛下、ですが…」{n}式部官は声をひそめて共謀者のようにささやく。{/n}「ゲストの方々と別れる前に、自由開拓者のチョーダとウィンタースケールとはあいさつしておくのがよろしいかと存じます。彼らが来訪したということは、陛下の権利に敬意を表している模様です。ですから、陛下の配慮がないために気分を害されたということがありますと、悲劇の極みとなりかねません」
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but..." {n}The master of ceremonies lowers his voice to a conspiratorial whisper.{/n} "Before you leave your guests, you may wish to greet Rogue Traders Chorda and Winterscale. Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

traits.locale_text: 「左様ですか、陛下、ですが…」{n}式部官は声をひそめて共謀者のようにささやく。{/n}「ゲストの方々と別れる前に、自由開拓者のチョーダとウィンタースケールとはあいさつしておくのがよろしいかと存じます。彼らが来訪したということは、陛下の権利に敬意を表している模様です。ですから、陛下の配慮がないために気分を害されたということがありますと、悲劇の極みとなりかねません」

languages.text: “听您吩咐，大人。不过……”{n}祭仪大师压低了声音，对你絮絮私语。{/n}“在您回房休息之前，是否要去见见行商浪人库尔达和温特斯凯尔？他们远道而来，也是表达对您继任行商浪人的尊重，不去打个招呼似乎有些不大合适。”
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but..." {n}The master of ceremonies lowers his voice to a conspiratorial whisper.{/n} "Before you leave your guests, you may wish to greet Rogue Traders Chorda and Winterscale. Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

traits.locale_text: “听您吩咐，大人。不过……”{n}祭仪大师压低了声音，对你絮絮私语。{/n}“在您回房休息之前，是否要去见见行商浪人库尔达和温特斯凯尔？他们远道而来，也是表达对您继任行商浪人的尊重，不去打个招呼似乎有些不大合适。”

languages.text: «Desde luego, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo...». {n}El maestro de ceremonias baja la voz hasta un susurro conspirador.{/n} «Antes de dejar a sus invitados, tal vez quiera saludar a los Comerciantes Independientes Chorda y Winterscale. Su visita es una muestra de respeto por sus derechos y sería trágico que se sintieran ofendidos por una falta de atención por su parte».
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but..." {n}The master of ceremonies lowers his voice to a conspiratorial whisper.{/n} "Before you leave your guests, you may wish to greet Rogue Traders Chorda and Winterscale. Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo...». {n}El maestro de ceremonias baja la voz hasta un susurro conspirador.{/n} «Antes de dejar a sus invitados, tal vez quiera saludar a los Comerciantes Independientes Chorda y Winterscale. Su visita es una muestra de respeto por sus derechos y sería trágico que se sintieran ofendidos por una falta de atención por su parte».

languages.text: « Certainement, Votre Seigneurie, mais... » {n}Le maître des cérémonies se met à murmurer sur un ton conspirateur :{/n} « Avant de quitter vos invités, vous devriez prendre le temps de saluer les libres-marchands Chorda et Winterscale. En vous gratifiant de leur présence, ils montrent à tous qu'ils respectent vos droits. Ils pourraient se froisser si vous ne leur accordiez pas la moindre attention. »
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but..." {n}The master of ceremonies lowers his voice to a conspiratorial whisper.{/n} "Before you leave your guests, you may wish to greet Rogue Traders Chorda and Winterscale. Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

traits.locale_text: « Certainement, Votre Seigneurie, mais… » {n}Le maître des cérémonies se met à murmurer sur un ton conspirateur :{/n} « Avant de quitter vos invités, vous devriez prendre le temps de saluer les libres-marchands Chorda et Winterscale. En vous gratifiant de leur présence, ils montrent à tous qu'ils respectent vos droits. Ils pourraient se froisser si vous ne leur accordiez pas la moindre attention. »

languages.text: "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ..." {n}Der Zeremonienmeister senkt seine Stimme zu einem verschwörerischen Flüstern.{/n} "Bevor Ihr Eure Gäste verlasst, solltet Ihr die Freihändler Chorda und Winterzunder begrüßen. Ihr Besuch ist eine Respektsbezeugung für Eure Rechte, und es wäre tragisch, wenn sie sich durch mangelnde Aufmerksamkeit Eurerseits beleidigt fühlen würden."
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but..." {n}The master of ceremonies lowers his voice to a conspiratorial whisper.{/n} "Before you leave your guests, you may wish to greet Rogue Traders Chorda and Winterscale. Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ..." {n}Der Zeremonienmeister senkt seine Stimme zu einem verschwörerischen Flüstern.{/n} "Bevor Ihr Eure Gäste verlasst, solltet Ihr die Freihändler Chorda und Winterzunder begrüßen. Ihr Besuch ist eine Respektsbezeugung für Eure Rechte, und es wäre tragisch, wenn sie sich durch mangelnde Aufmerksamkeit Eurerseits beleidigt fühlen würden."

languages.text: "Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama..." {n}Teşrifatçı, fısıltıyla sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Misafirlerinize veda etmeden önce Chorda ile Winterscale Hür Tacirlerini selamlamak isteyebilirsiniz. Ziyaretleri, haklarınıza duydukları saygının emaresidir. Kendilerine gereken ilgiyi göstermemenizden rahatsızlık duymaları, çok tatsız olur."
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but..." {n}The master of ceremonies lowers his voice to a conspiratorial whisper.{/n} "Before you leave your guests, you may wish to greet Rogue Traders Chorda and Winterscale. Their visit is a sign of their respect for your rights, and it would be most tragic if they were to feel offended by a lack of attention from you."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama..." {n}Teşrifatçı, fısıltıyla sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Misafirlerinizden ayrılmadan önce Chorda ile Winterscale Hür Tacirlerini selamlamak isteyebilirsiniz. Ziyaretleri, haklarınıza duydukları saygının bir emaresi. Kendilerine gereken ilgiyi göstermemenizden rahatsızlık duyarlarsa üzücü olur."
